name: Lebanon Hanover
description:
'''Lebanon Hanover''' is a Swissâ€“British music duo formed in 2010 in [[Sunderland]], England. It consists of Swiss vocalist and guitarist Larissa Iceglass and British vocalist, bassist and synthesist William Maybelline.

The group is signed to Greece's Fabrika Records and has released six studio albums to date. Their name comes from two neighbouring towns ([[Lebanon, New Hampshire|Lebanon]] and [[Hanover, New Hampshire|Hanover]]) in [[New Hampshire]], United States.
